sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' const Datatable = (props) => { const formatNumber = (number) => new Intl.NumberFormat('en', { maximumFractionDigits: 0, minimumFractionDigits: 0, style: 'currency', currency: 'USD', }).format(number) let totalRevenue = props.data.reduce(function (acc, curr) { return acc + curr.unitPrice * curr.sold }, 0) totalRevenue = totalRevenue.toFixed(2) return ( {props.data.map((prop) => ( ))}
Product Revenue
{prop.name} {formatNumber( ( parseFloat(prop.unitPrice, 2) * parseFloat(prop.sold, 2) ).toFixed(2) )}
Total {formatNumber(totalRevenue)}
) } export default Datatable
